author: Ed Crocker
description:
Rachel Harrison has written a series of books now using a successful formula—and I use formula in the positive sense, as in the formula for time travel not oh god how formulaic—of using different supernatural creatures as lenses through which to view the societal prisons that women are placed in. Witches, vampires, werewolves, the devil; […]

The post REVIEW: Play Nice by Rachel Harrison appeared first on Grimdark Magazine.
title: REVIEW: Play Nice by Rachel Harrison
